(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (SQ
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VB order)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Akami-dane))
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
            (NP (JJ red) (NN flesh) (NN fish))
            (-RRB- -RRB-)))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (DT a) (NNP Sushi) (NN bar))
          (, ,))))))

          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S

              (NP (NN beef)

                (NN lamb))
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ its) (NN red))
                (VP (VBG coloring)
                  (ADVP (RB too)))))))))
    (, ,)))

            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN relationship))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP him))))

              (NP (PDT such) (DT an) (JJ important) (NN role))

                    (NP (NN tuna)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADVP (RB probably))
        (VP (VBN cut)
          (PP (IN from)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN section))
              (PP (IN near)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN neck))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP Tuna)))))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBN known)
          (PP (IN as)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Shimofuri))
              (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                (NP (NN snow) (NN frost))
                (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))
    (. .)))
